blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Runtime > UMG > Components

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • USceneComponent
  • UWidgetInteractionComponent

References

   
Module UMG
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/UMG/Public/Components/WidgetInteractionComponent.h
Include #include "Components/WidgetInteractionComponent.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (ClassGroup="UserInterface", Meta=(BlueprintSpawnableComponent), MinimalAPI)  
class UWidgetInteractionComponent : public USceneComponent

Remarks

This is a component to allow interaction with the Widget Component. This class allows you to simulate a sort of laser pointer device, when it hovers over widgets it will send the basic signals to show as if the mouse were moving on top of it. You'll then tell the component to simulate key presses, like Left Mouse, down and up, to simulate a mouse click.

Variables

  Type Name Description
bool bEnableHitTesting Should the interaction component perform hit testing (Automatic or Custom) and attempt to simulate hover - if you were going to emulate a keyboard you would want to turn this option off if the virtual keyboard was separate from the virtual pointer device and used a second interaction component.
bool bIsHoveredWidgetFocusable Are we hovering over any focusable widget?
bool bIsHoveredWidgetHitTestVisible Are we hovered over a widget that is hit test visible?
bool bIsHoveredWidgetInteractable Are we hovering over any interactive widgets.
bool bShowDebug Shows some debugging lines and a hit sphere to help you debug interactions.
FHitResult CustomHitResult Stores the custom hit result set by the player.
FLinearColor DebugColor Determines the color of the debug lines.
float DebugLineThickness Determines the thickness of the debug lines.
float DebugSphereLineThickness Determines the line thickness of the debug sphere.
TObjectPtr< UWidgetComponent > HoveredWidgetComponent The widget component we're currently hovering over.
float InteractionDistance The distance in game units the component should be able to interact with a widget component.
EWidgetInteractionSource InteractionSource Should we project from the world location of the component? If you set this to false, you'll need to call SetCustomHitResult(), and provide the result of a custom hit test form whatever location you wish.
FHitResult LastHitResult The last hit result we used.
FVector2D LastLocalHitLocation The last 2D location on the widget component that was hit.
FWeakWidgetPath LastWidgetPath The last widget path under the hit result.
FVector2D LocalHitLocation The 2D location on the widget component that was hit.
FModifierKeysState ModifierKeys The modifier keys to simulate during key presses.
FOnHoveredWidgetChanged OnHoveredWidgetChanged Called when the hovered Widget Component changes.
int32 PointerIndex Each user virtual controller or virtual finger tips being simulated should use a different pointer index.
TSet< FKey > PressedKeys The current set of pressed keys we maintain the state of.
TEnumAsByte< ECollisionChannel > TraceChannel The trace channel to use when tracing for widget components in the world.
TSharedPtr< FSlateVirtualUserHandle > VirtualUser Represents the virtual user in slate.
int32 VirtualUserIndex Represents the Virtual User Index.
